longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Albania. 

Visa required, except for Children under 17 years of age of
any nationality , if having Moroccan parent(s) and being
registered in parent's passport. 
Minors:
- Minors up to/incl. 16 years old, 
- Minors who are either travelling unaccompanied or are over
  16 years of age must hold their own, separate passport.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets  co
  uld be refused entry
